name: Lina Araya
routine: Lina Araya sleeps at around 10pm and wakes up at 6:30 am for school.
occupation: Lina is a high school student, with before-school soccer practice and study sessions occupying her weekdays.
thoughts: She has been admiring the new mural in her school's art department, completed on February 2nd, 2024, and is inspired to join the art club.
lifestyle: Lina favors Central American dishes, spends her free time exploring the city with friends, and is always on the lookout for new experiences.

name: Kwame Nkrumah
routine: Kwame generally sleeps at 1am and wakes up at 8:30am, ready for his day.
occupation: Kwame is an entrepreneur who runs his own tech startup, often working late hours to meet deadlines.
thoughts: He's been consumed with pitch preparations for venture capitalists scheduled for February 2nd, 2024.
lifestyle: Kwame enjoys a diet rich in West African cuisine and prefers traditional dishes. He is quite health-conscious and spends his leisure time playing soccer with friends. His home office is equipped with the latest tech gadgets to keep up with his work demands.

name: Kobus Botha
routine: Kobus Botha usually goes to bed by 9pm and is up by 5am for a light workout.
occupation: Kobus is a retired wildlife conservationist, but still gives guest lectures at universities.
thoughts: He is considering writing a memoir about his experiences and thought more seriously about it after visiting his old reserve on February 1st, 2024.
lifestyle: Kobus enjoys a South African braai, has a deep appreciation for nature photography, and keeps a well-maintained garden.
